label: Vitrum I EU Boiler
description: Vitrum touch timer switch Dual Relay
info_overview:
FUNCTIONAL SPECIFICATION

• One-button Boiler switch

• Touch control with capacitive technology

• Acoustic feedback signal

• Crown back-lit by low-consumption LED's

COMMAND MODE

• One capcative button with ON-15 Min,30 Min, 45 Min, 60 Min & OFF Button.
info_inclusion: Touch any of the keys on Vitrum to include the unit.
info_exclusion:
EXCLUSION

• Press and hold down the touch key on the Vitrum unit (EU Standard), for at least 8 seconds.

FACTORY RESET

a.using the hidden button

• Remove the Vitrum unit from the wall-mounting box.

• Press the hidden Factory Reset button and hold down for at least 3 seconds.

Vitrum will flash red three times and sound an acoustic signal to indicate that the original factory setting has been restored.

category_description: Any device attached to the wall that controls a binary status of something, for ex. a light switch
errors: At least one device manual must be uploaded as PDF
warnings: Endpoint 0 contains both switch and dimmer channels. It probably should only include dimmer!
Endpoint 1 contains both switch and dimmer channels. It probably should only include dimmer!
